text: wlw jaealna alrasul almrsl 'iilayhim malakana 'iidh lm yaqtanieuu bmhmd salaa allah ealayh wslm, lajaealna dhlk almalik fi surat albshr, hataa yastatieuu alsmae minh wmkhatbth; 'iidh lays b'imkanhm ruyat almalik ealaa suratih almlaykyt, walaw ja'ahum almalik bisurat rajul lashtbh al'amr elyhm, kama ashtbh ealayhim 'amr muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm
